name: Nice cool
description:
This is a game based on the Cult of Jabrils #Stay@home game jam theme 2020 - The more you do an action, the weaker it performs. This game is based on a ball which health is based on its speed. Vision is going to be limited, so you explore the map by hurtling around, but be careful, because of the health-speed correlation.

1 is used to turn on the cursor

Movement is limited to only one-axis movement, which doesn't change regardless of camera angle.
